species_classes.name: Humanoid

physical_characteristics.form: Bipedal human-like forms with diverse variations
features: most portraits feature different models for male and female variants

key_traits: cultural diversity with multiple government types
species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Humanoid alien, bipedal, human-like features, diverse skin tones, varied clothing styles, futuristic aesthetic, diplomatic appearance

species_classes.name: Mammalian
key_traits: varied specializations from peaceful to aggressive
species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Mammalian alien, fur-covered, animal-like features, clothing/garments, varied body sizes from slender to massive, distinct facial features with snouts and ears

species_classes.name: Reptilian

physical_characteristics.form: Scale-covered beings based on reptiles and amphibians
features: some have distinctive head crests, frills, or shell-like features
colors range from earth tones to vibrant greens and blues

species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Reptilian alien, scaled skin, dinosaur-like or lizard features, prehistoric appearance, earth-toned colors, tribal or military aesthetic

species_classes.name: Avian

physical_characteristics.form: Bird-like creatures with beaks, feathers, and wing structures
features: many retain wing structures in bipedal form

species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Avian alien, bird-like features, feathers, beak, wing structures, colorful plumage, aerial grace, predatory or songbird appearance

species_classes.name: Arthropoid

physical_characteristics.form: Insect and arachnid-inspired forms with exoskeletons
features: range from delicate to heavily armored
some have eight legs and eight eyes

species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Arthropoid alien, insect-like, exoskeleton, multiple limbs, compound eyes, segmented body, chitinous armor, technological aesthetic

species_classes.name: Molluscoid

physical_characteristics.form: Soft-bodied creatures with tentacles and smooth, wet-looking skin
features: distinctive tentacles for manipulation and movement

species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Molluscoid alien, tentacles, soft smooth skin, wet appearance, flowing organic shapes, translucent elements, philosophical demeanor

species_classes.name: Fungoid

physical_characteristics.form: Mushroom and fungal-inspired forms with spore-based reproduction
features: some appear parasitic controlling host bodies
distinctive caps, gills, organic growth patterns

species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Fungoid alien, mushroom-like, spore-based, organic growth patterns, caps and gills, earthy colors, parasitic or symbiotic appearance

species_classes.name: Plantoid
species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Plantoid alien, plant-like features, leaves and flowers, bark-textured skin, photosynthetic, green/brown colors, nature harmony aesthetic

species_classes.name: Lithoid

physical_characteristics.form: Rock and crystal-based lifeforms made of living stone
features: some have energy flowing between body segments

species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Lithoid alien, rock-like, crystalline features, mineral composition, massive boulder body, gem-like elements, geological aesthetic

species_classes.name: Necroid

physical_characteristics.form: Undead and death-themed species with gothic aesthetics
features: some require technological assistance to survive

key_traits: necrophage: consume other species for reproduction
species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Necroid alien, undead appearance, skeletal or mummified, gothic aesthetic, dark colors, death-themed, cybernetic enhancements, cult-like

species_classes.name: Aquatic
species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Aquatic alien, fish-like features, fins and gills, scaled skin, bioluminescent, oceanic aesthetic, graceful swimming posture

species_classes.name: Toxoid

physical_characteristics.form: Adapted to toxic environments with hazardous appearances

key_traits: exotic metabolism: enhanced adaptation to hostile environments
species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Toxoid alien, toxic appearance, warning colors, industrial aesthetic, hazmat-like features, pollution-adapted, resilient build

species_classes.name: Machine

features: range from sleek synthetic to industrial robot designs

key_traits: machine intelligence: gestalt consciousness, no biological needs
species_classes.ai_prompt_elements: Machine alien, robotic appearance, metallic construction, glowing elements, mechanical joints, synthetic aesthetic, technological design
